9 MulticamVOPipeline::MulticamVOPipeline(): node_("~")
10 {
11  // get image topic
12  node_.param<std::string>("image_topic", param_imageTopic_, "/camera/image_raw");
13 
14  // get calibration data
15  getCalibration();
16 
17  // indicate it is the first frame
18  first_ = true;
19 
20  // initialize lost frames counter
21  lostFrameCounter = 0;
22  seqNumberPrev = 0;
23 
24  featureDetector = FeatureDetector(node_, SHI_TOMASI, ORB);
25  featureMatcher = FeatureMatcher(node_);
26 
27  // advertise odometry topic
28  pubOdom_ = node_.advertise<nav_msgs::Odometry>("multicamOdometer/odometry", 1);
29 
30  // subscribe to image topic
31  image_transport::ImageTransport it(node_);
32  subImage_ = it.subscribe(param_imageTopic_, 1, &MulticamVOPipeline::imageCallback, this);
33 }

52 void MulticamVOPipeline::imageCallback(const sensor_msgs::Image::ConstPtr &msg)
53 {
54  // convert msg to cv::Mat and split
55  cv::Mat_<uint8_t> fullImage = cv::Mat_<uint8_t>(NUM_CAMERAS*IMAGE_WIDTH, IMAGE_HEIGHT, const_cast<uint8_t*>(&msg->data[0]), msg->step);
56  std::vector<cv::Mat> splitImages = splitLadybug(fullImage, MONO);
57 
58  int seqNumber = msg->header.seq;
59  //std::cout << "FRAME " << seqNumber << std::endl;
60  if(seqNumber - seqNumberPrev > 1)
61  {
62  ROS_WARN("Lost %d frames!", seqNumber - seqNumberPrev - 1);
63  lostFrameCounter += seqNumber - seqNumberPrev - 1;
64  }
65  seqNumberPrev = seqNumber;
66 
67  // rectify images
68  std::vector<cv::Mat> imagesRect = MulticamVOPipeline::rectify(splitImages);
69 
70  // detect and track features
71  std::vector<std::vector<Feature>> featuresAllCameras;
72  for(int i=0; i<NUM_CAMERAS; i++)
73  {
74  std::vector<Feature> features;
75  features = featureDetector.detectFeatures(imagesRect[i], seqNumber, i);
76 
77  featuresAllCameras.push_back(features);
78  }
79 
80  if(!first_)
81  {
82  // match features
83  std::vector<std::vector<Match>> matches = featureMatcher.findOmniMatches(imagesRectPrev, imagesRect, featuresAllCamerasPrev, featuresAllCameras, NUM_CAMERAS-1);
84 
85  // show optical flow
86  /*cv::Mat imFeat;
87  cv::cvtColor(imagesRect[3], imFeat, CV_GRAY2BGR);
88  for(int i=0; i<matches.size(); i++)
89  {
90  if(matches[i].getFirstFeature().getCamNumber() == matches[i].getSecondFeature().getCamNumber() && matches[i].getSecondFeature().getCamNumber() == 3)
91  {
92  cv::Point2f pt1 = matches[i].getFirstFeature().getKeypoint().pt;
93  cv::Point2f pt2 = matches[i].getSecondFeature().getKeypoint().pt;
94  cv::line(imFeat, pt1, pt2, matches[i].getColor());
95  }
96  }
97  cv::namedWindow("matches intra camera", CV_WINDOW_AUTOSIZE);
98  cv::imshow("matches intra camera", imFeat);*/
99 
100 
101  // estimate motion
102  MulticamOdometer odometer(node_);
103  odometer.estimateMotion(matches, NUM_CAMERAS-1, calib);
104 
105  // publish odometry
106  nav_msgs::Odometry msgOdom;
107  pubOdom_.publish(msgOdom);
108  }
109  else
110  {
111  first_ = false;
112  }
113 
114  // update image and features for tracking
115  imagesRectPrev = imagesRect;
116  featuresAllCamerasPrev = featuresAllCameras;
117 
118  // for showing images
119  //cv::waitKey(10);
120 }

125 std::vector<cv::Mat> MulticamVOPipeline::rectify(std::vector<cv::Mat> images)
126 {
127  std::vector<cv::Mat> imagesRect;
128  for(int i=0; i<NUM_CAMERAS; i++)
129  {
130  cv::Mat imRect;
131  calib[i].rectifyImage(images[i], imRect);
132  imagesRect.push_back(imRect);
133  }
134 
135  return imagesRect;
136 }
137 
141 void MulticamVOPipeline::getCalibration()
142 {
143  for(int i=0; i<NUM_CAMERAS; i++)
144  {
145  // get path of yaml calibration file
146  char param_calibPath[50];
147  sprintf(param_calibPath, "calib_file_cam_%d", i);
148  std::string calibFilename;
149  node_.param<std::string>(std::string(param_calibPath), calibFilename, "");
150 
151  // open calibration yaml file
152  std::ifstream fin(calibFilename);
153 
154  // parse yaml file to get cameraInfo
155  std::string camName;
156  sensor_msgs::CameraInfo camInfo;
157  bool ret = camera_calibration_parsers::readCalibrationYml(fin, camName, camInfo);
158  if(ret == false)
159  {
160  ROS_ERROR("Invalid calibration file! Exiting...");
161  ros::shutdown();
162  }
163 
164  std::cout << "Found calibration of camera " << camName << std::endl;
165 
166  // get pinhole camera model out of cameraInfo
167  image_geometry::PinholeCameraModel camModel;
168  camModel.fromCameraInfo(camInfo);
169  calib.push_back(camModel);
170  }
171 }
172 
173 }
